intro: Lass schwackei, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to Tanzania. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, dark green leaves and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments and prefers well-draining soil. It is popular as a houseplant due to its compact size and ability to bloom throughout the year. Lass schwackei requires indirect sunlight and regular watering to thrive.
